about_the_game:
Tactical domino placement

Get the highest possible score by expanding your domino web. Unfold the cosmic plane and optimise your domino placing route to collect as many resources as you can. 

Manage the cosmic plane

The bigger your domino web, the more vulnerable you become. Each turn the plane changes so you will have to improvise to win.

Manage your resources

Collect cash, upgrade your deck and buy Nova Cards to create crazy synergies and tactical variety.

Satisfying visuals

Immerse yourself in a cosmic dance of colors and special effects. The higher you score, the more visually exciting the dance becomes.

Dynamic board elements

All the cosmic elements have an effect on eachother. Fire, explosives, ice, electricity, darkness, water and more. This makes every new playthrough dynamic and different.

Features:

  • 30 upgradable domino pieces

  • 150 unique Nova Chips that alter the game significantly

  • 8 unlockable decks with each their own difficulty level.

  • 20 unlockable challenges

  • Daily playthroughs with leaderboards

  • Addictive visual effects that will make you want to come back over and over.

Wishlist now!

name: Dominova

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Sound Card: Have a sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Sound Card: Have a sound card

short_description: Dominova is a turn-based roguelike deckbuilder where you place webs of dominoes to cause satisfying chain reactions on a cosmic plane.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
